body: Hi, I'm vobaseball12. I'm pretty new to this server. Here's some things about me:1. I come from OCN, and have been playing there for about 2 years.2. I know TheTNTDude :P3. You can call me vo.Hoep to see you In-game!

replies.body: Hey! Welcome to the Avicus forums! Please make sure to read the rules so you don't get in any trouble. If you need any help just ask any staff member they would be glad to help. Also be sure to check out TeamSpeak and PlugDJ. Have a great time on the server and the forums!

replies.body: I have a couple of questions, is there a command in-game to find staff, like OCN has /staff? Also, where do you report players, like I mean with screenshots or videos? Thanks.
replies.body_tagged: I have a couple of questions, is there a command in-game to find staff, like OCN has /staff? Also, where do you report players, like I mean with screenshots or videos? Thanks.

reply_to.body: Welcome Vo! Feel free to ask me or another staff member any questions or concerns that you may have, see you around! :D
reply_to.body_tagged: Welcome Vo! Feel free to ask me or another staff member any questions or concerns that you may have, see you around! :D

replies.body: You can join our teamspeak @ ts.avicus.net! Thank you for joining Avicus. :)
replies.body_tagged: You can join our teamspeak @ ts.avicus.net! Thank you for joining Avicus. :)

replies.body: You can also go to the Player Reports by visiting this link: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47 (Be sure to follow the format) You will usually be able to find a Staff Member in-game and if not, you can always come on TeamSpeak or find one on Skype.
replies.body_tagged: You can also go to the Player Reports by visiting this link: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47 (Be sure to follow the format) You will usually be able to find a Staff Member in-game and if not, you can always come on TeamSpeak or find one on Skype.

replies.body:
Vo, if you need to find a staff member, and there's no one on, or you can't get anyone's attention, take a pic and post it on the forums.

We hope you enjoy your stay!
